title: Special 1 Month Rent Off! Renovated Corner 2 Bedroom - Two Patios!
posting_body: ['Metropolitan Apartments', 'CALL US:', 'show contact info', 'x306', 'Plan 2AR  2 \xa0bed / 2 bath / 1122 Sq.', 'Ft / From $4,771', '* Unit 119 - Available', 'Now', 'Incredibly walkable, award-winning living at the Metropolitan in San Mateo.', '"Metropolitan offers a two-bedroom, two-bathroom apartment with modern features.', 'The kitchen has Energy Star-certified GE stainless steel appliances.', 'European white cabinets have brushed chrome hardware for a stylish finish.', 'In addition, this home has granite countertops and Italian tile flooring.', 'The spacious living room has a quaint fireplace with a limestone mantel.', 'The in-home washer and dryer allow you to do laundry chores at a convenient time.', 'Metropolitan is a non-smoking and pet-friendly neighborhood.', 'You have access to a fully equipped fitness center, a modern conference room, and a new clubhouse.', 'This neighborhood has a movie theater that seats up to sixteen people.', 'You can even have a relaxing time at the pool or in the steam sauna.', 'Call for details: pricing/availability subject to change at any time. "', 'Floor Plan Specials', '1 Month Rent Off on Select Apartments', 'Floor Plan/Unit Amenities:', '* Large patio/balcony', '* Location - End/Corner Unit', '* Stainless steel appliances', '* Interior - Fireplace', '* Location - Close to Amenities', '* Floor - First', 'Property Amenities:', '* ClubHouse', '* HighSpeed', '* Laundry', '* NightPatrol', '* OnSiteManagement', '* OnsiteMaintenance', '* Availability24Hours', '* PackageReceiving', '* Recycling', '* ShortTermLease', '* SmokeFree', '* Pool', '* Sundeck', '* WirelessInternet', '*', 'FitnessCenter', '* Elevator', '* Gate', '* BusinessCenter', '* ConferenceRoom', '* Sauna', '* Spa', '*', 'Other', '* Garage', '* Transportation', '* TVLounge', '* JoggingWalkingTrails', '* GroceryService', 'CALL US TODAY!', 'show contact info', 'x306', 'Metropolitan Apartments', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Address:', '338 South Fremont Street San Mateo, CA 94401', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
